animeTitle: Cider no You ni Kotoba ga Wakiagaru
animeDescription: The visual features the tagline, "I met you in my 17th summer..." The "boy-meets-girl" story depicts how words and music bridge the gap between Cherry, a boy who is terrible at communicating with other people, and Smile, a girl who hides behind a mask. They meet in a mundane suburban shopping mall in a provincial city.  Cherry always wears headphones and puts the feelings he cannot utter into his hobby, Japanese haiku poems. Smile always wears a mask to conceal her large front teeth, for which she has dental braces. As a popular video star, she streams a video about seeking "cuteness."  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Cider no You ni Kotoba ga Wakiagaru']
